name: LEGO Indiana Jones: The Original Adventures

files.installer: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/LEGO Indiana Jones - The Original Adventures/LEGOIndy.exe

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/LEGO Indiana Jones - The Original Adventures/LEGOIndy.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
